title: PBR Metalic Roughness material model
description: Feature-compatible with [glTF material](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/tree/master/specification/2.0#materials) (with the exception of emissive texture?)

baseColorFactor.description: The material's base color factor. default=`[1,1,1,1]`

metallicFactor.description: the metalness of the material. default=`1.0`

roughnessFactor.description: the roughness of the material. default=`1.0`
